trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event occurs when a control is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>evento si verifica quando un controllo viene ridisegnato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>

trans-unit.source: A PaintEventArgs specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A> to use to paint the control and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.ClipRectangle%2A> in which to paint.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto PaintEventArgs specifica di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A>da utilizzare per disegnare il controllo e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.ClipRectangle%2A>in cui disegnare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.ClipRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information about the event model, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni sul modello di eventi, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified graphics and clipping rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> classe con il grafico specificato e il rettangolo di ridimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> identified by the `graphics` parameter is disposed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> is disposed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>identificato dal `graphics` parametro viene eliminato quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>è stato eliminato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the item.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> usato per disegnare l'elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the rectangle in which to paint.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> che rappresenta il rettangolo in cui disegnare.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle in which to paint.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il rettangolo in cui disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> in which to paint.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> in cui disegnare.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse usate dal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare Dispose dopo aver terminato di utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Dispose lascia il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>in uno stato inutilizzabile.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver chiamato Dispose, è necessario rilasciare tutti i riferimenti al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>in modo che il garbage collector può recuperare la memoria che di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>occupata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementazione di un metodo Dispose](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chiamare sempre Dispose prima di rilasciare l'ultimo riferimento a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, le risorse non vengono liberate finché il garbage collector chiama la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>dell'oggetto `Finalize` metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite usate da di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> e facoltativamente rilascia le risorse gestite.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato dal metodo pubblico `Dispose()` (metodo) e <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected Dispose method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`richiama il metodo Dispose protetto con il `disposing` parametro impostato su `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>richiama `Dispose` con `disposing` impostato su `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando il `disposing` parametro è true, questo metodo rilascia tutte le risorse utilizzate dagli oggetti gestiti da questo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>riferimenti.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo richiama il `Dispose()` metodo di ciascun oggetto cui viene fatto riferimento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per rilasciare le risorse gestite e non gestite. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Consente a un oggetto tentare di liberare risorse ed eseguire altre operazioni di pulizia prima che venga recuperato da garbage collection.

trans-unit.source: Gets the graphics used to paint.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto graphics utilizzato per disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to paint.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> oggetto utilizzato per disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object provides methods for drawing objects on the display device.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> oggetto fornisce metodi per disegnare oggetti sul dispositivo di visualizzazione.
